verses.roman:
sabā-pāśa ājñā māgi' calana-samaya
prabhu-pade kahe kichu kariyā vinaya

synonyms: sabā—all of them; pāśa—from; ājñā—order; māgi'-taking; calana-samaya—at the time of departure; prabhu-pade—at the lotus feet of the Lord; kahe—say; kichu—something; kariyā—doing; vinaya—submission.
translation: After begging the permission of all the Vaiṣṇavas present, the two brothers, at the time of their departure, humbly submitted something at the lotus feet of the Lord.
